ES_Don't interrupt and don't ask

ES_This operation does not apply to Install Application because Install Application is part of the system on this device. Use Install Application to find and install applications.
ES_How often should %1 ask for permission to use airtime? Using airtime may result in charges.
ES_Don't use airtime and don't ask
ES_How often should %1 ask for permission before sending or receiving text messages?
ES_Don't send or receive messages and don't ask
ES_How often should %1 ask for permission to record audio and images? This will use space on your phone.
ES_Don't record and don't ask
ES_Computer Connection
ES_How often should %1 ask for permission to connect to a computer? This may require a data cable that came with your phone.
ES_Don't connect and don't ask
ES_Auto-Start Registration
ES_How often should %1 ask for permission to register itself to automatically start?
ES_Don't register and don't ask

ES_Just do it and don't ask
ES_Ask once per application use
ES_Ask every time

ES_Don't give my location and don't ask

ES_Don't access my landmark database and don't ask

ES_Don't access my smart card and don't ask
ES_Read Personal Data

ES_Don't read my data and don't ask

ES_Don't update my data and don't ask

ES_Don't sign and don't ask

ES_Don't open any restricted connections and don't ask
ES_Sensor Connections

ES_Don't open any sensor connections and don't ask
ES_Contactless Connections

ES_Don't open any contactless connections and don't ask
